name: Sharp International
overview: Sharp International is a Partnership business venture that started its business operations in the year 1990 at Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu in India. Since inception, we have emerged as one of the prominent names engaged in manufacturing, exporting and supplying exclusive range of quality-assured Men’s Mercerised T-Shirts, Men’s Sweatshirts, Men’s, Women’s and Kids Wear. Our product range includes Kids Printed Dresses, Kids Frocks, Baba Suits, Kids Casual Suits, Infant Wear, Kids Rompers, Kids T-Shirts, Women’s Bathrobes, Women’s Leggings, Women’s Nighties, Women’s Pyjamas, Men’s Striped T-Shirts, Men’s Printed T-Shirts and more. Our partner Mr. G. Sugumar, we are able to expand our business procedures throughout the nation. Our products are highly cherished across the nation for its long life, easy to wash, comfortable, durable, fine stitch, fade proof, easy to clean and reliable nature. Besides, our range is available in varied patterns, designs, colors and sizes to suit the growing needs and demands of our clients

offices.address1: 215/2, Sakthi Nagar, Boyampalayam, P.N. Road, Pooluvapatti P.O
